headline.main: FOREIGN EXTRACTS,; The English Government and the Eastern War--Mr. Layard's Speech.

docs.lead_paragraph: In his speech at Liverpool, after discussing the grounds on which the present war was commenced, Mr. LAYARD went on to criticise and condemn, in the sharpest possible terms, the manner in which it has been carried on. We copy the following striking passages from the conclusion of his remarks :
docs.abstract: Speech on Eastern war - his personal appearance
